title: Textile, 1960s
medium:
Medium: polyester, cotton
Technique: acid printed
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 276 x 179 cm (9 ft. 11/16 in. x 5 ft. 10 1/2 in.)
description: Panel of sheer white cloth acid printed to create large scale symmetrical design of Turkish inspiration. Acid printing is a process where the acid removes one of the fibers leaving a pattern on the foundation fabric which is acid resistant.
